Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1839978616415977472/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Article from URL, Summary, Photos & Video"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1839978616415977472/)_"
---
You need to perform 4 tasks with the plugins activated.
1. Create a complete and structured article on the following webpage:
[PROMPT]
2. Select 2 illustrative photos for this article
3.Create a 100 word summary of the generated article
4.Create a video from the summary
Language: [TARGETLANGUAGE]
PromptHint: Please provide me with a link so I can do my magic. Love you! :D
